snippet: West Virginia lawmakers put a ban on a common second-trimester abortion method into law.
abstract: West Virginia legislators override Gov Earl Ray Tomblin's veto and implement measure that bans common second-trimester abortion method.
lead_paragraph: West Virginia lawmakers put a ban on a common second-trimester abortion method into law.

headline.main: West Virginia: Veto on Abortion Curb Overridden
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Veto on Abortion Curb Overridden
